content:
1.1. Reduces Risk of Chronic Diseases: Regular exercise can lower the risk of developing chronic diseases like heart disease, diabetes, and some cancers.
1.2. Improves Heart Health: Exercise helps to strengthen the heart and improve cardiovascular function.
1.3. Supports Lung Health: Physical activity can improve lung function and endurance.
1.4. Lowers Blood Pressure: Regular exercise has been shown to lower blood pressure and reduce the risk of stroke.
1.5. Increases Insulin Sensitivity: Exercise can improve insulin sensitivity and reduce the risk of type 2 diabetes.
